title: Pat McFadden – 2022 Comments on the “Vanishing Chancellor”
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Pat McFadden, the Shadow Chief Secretary to the Treasury, on 10 January 2022.
content:
Once again, when British families and businesses need support, the Chancellor has pulled a vanishing act and disappeared.
